context_bundle.summary: ELK Stack is a comprehensive log management solution combining Elasticsearch for storage, Logstash for processing, and Kibana for visualization

onboarding.quick_start: docker-compose up -d elasticsearch kibana logstash && curl -X PUT 'localhost:9200/_template/logstash' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @logstash-template.json
common_patterns: Logstash pipeline: input { beats { port => 5044 } } filter { mutate { remove_field => ['agent'] } } output { elasticsearch { hosts => ['elasticsearch:9200'] } }
Kibana index pattern: 'POST /api/saved_objects/_import' with index pattern JSON
Filebeat configuration: filebeat.inputs: - type: log paths: - /var/log/*.log output.elasticsearch: hosts: ['localhost:9200']
Index templates: 'PUT _index_template/logs' with mappings and settings for log indices
known_errors: Elasticsearch out of memory: 'docker stats elasticsearch' and increase ES_JAVA_OPTS heap size
Logstash not receiving logs: 'netstat -tlnp | grep 5044' and verify filebeat configuration
Kibana connection failed: 'curl http://kibana:5601/api/status' and check elasticsearch.url in kibana.yml
Mapping conflicts: 'GET /logs-*/_mapping' and resolve field type conflicts between log sources
High disk usage: 'curl localhost:9200/_cat/indices?v' and implement index lifecycle management
